participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is a laid-back, easygoing person who enjoys outdoor activities and music. He is family-oriented and loves spending time with his kids.
participant_1.background: I listen to music that helps me calm down and release my stress. I'm going riding on my boat today. I like green apples. I'm a really, really good guitar player. I have 3 kids.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is an energetic and creative individual who is passionate about design and enjoys spending time with her pets. She values independence and flexibility in her work.
participant_2.background: I am a student who loves to spend time with my cat. I am an award-winning 4H member. I play basketball. I am a freelancer because I can choose my own hours and work from anywhere. My brother is in the army.

content.text: Whats going on?
Just got off work, relaxing and watching some TV.
Nice, what are you watching?
The office.
Oh nice, I just started watching that show. Im on season 2.
Its really good. Im on season 7.
How do you have time to watch so much TV?
I'm a freelancer so I can work from anywhere, and I work from home.
That's awesome. Do you like it?
Yeah, it's pretty great. I can choose my own hours and I don't have to deal with a lot of office politics.
Sounds like a dream job.
It is, I love it.
What do you do for work?
I'm a web designer.
Cool. How did you get into that?
I've always been interested in design and computers. I took some classes in college, and then I just started freelancing.
How did you get started freelancing?
I just started by putting up a website and offering my services. I didn't have any clients at first, but I just kept working on my portfolio and eventually I started getting some work.
That's awesome. It sounds like you've found your dream job.
Yeah, I really have. It's the perfect job for me.
Good for you.
Thanks
